DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate of adjuvant therapy using oxaliplatin and gemcitabine (GEMOX regimen) versus capecitabine alone chemotherapy in patients who underwent curative surgery for intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma (ICC) -- a randomized control study.
DOC.brief_title: Oxaliplatin+Gemcitabine vs Capecitabine as Adjuvant Therapy for Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: chemotherapy: GEMOX vs capecitabine alone; adjuvant settings; primary endpoint: recurrence-free survival (RFS); second endpoint: overall survival after surgery (OS).
